desc.en: BTEX is a de-centralized exchange on EOS, which push all the exchange core functions to the blockchain, such as listing, matching, clearing and so on. Greatly guaranteeing the security of trader' assets, and token issuer can self-help list on BTEX. BT is a platform token, through the holding of BT enjoy the relevant rights and interests, including 100% Commission dividends, voting rights, value-added profits, etc.
desc.zh: BTEX是EOS上的去中心化交易所，将上币、撮合、结算等交易所核心功能全部上链，极大的保障交易者的资产安全，同时Token发行方可自助上币。BT是平台代币，通过持有BT享有相关权益，包括手续费100%分红、投票权、增值获利等。
